body.p: An entity shall use its judgement to determine an appropriate number of time bands in preparing the maturity analysis required by paragraph 42E(e). For example, an entity might determine that the following maturity time bands are appropriate:

li.p: later than one month and not later than three months;
later than three months and not later than six months;
later than six months and not later than one year;
later than one year and not later than three years;
later than three years and not later than five years; and
